ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, I agree with Sartori here.  Yah it was AWESOME to have such a powerful charm.  But it was hardly realistic.  And to be honest I seriously doubt the gods
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, I agree with Sartori here. Yah it was AWESOME to have such a
powerful charm. But it was hardly realistic. And to be honest I seriously
doubt the gods and planes will remain weaker than kunark long. Be watching
for some serious upgrades to the alternate planes once Kunark hits.

I'd HIGHLY recommend that people not camp out in the planes much longer ;)

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2000 10:58 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT

too
> green..."
>
> And in Kunark, some generic HG will be more powerful than these 'gods' ?
>
> Sylly
>
